sections.heading: obligors.The amount of any obligation issued, assumed, or guaranteed by more than one obligor and authorized under more than one provision of the Insurers Investment Act shall be allocated to those provisions on a basis proportional to the obligations of each obligor

sections.text:
44-5116.Several obligors.

The amount of any obligation issued, assumed, or guaranteed by more than one obligor and authorized under more than one provision of the Insurers Investment Act shall be allocated to those provisions on a basis proportional to the obligations of each obligor.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 237, ยง 16.
